xldoc.title: A Conversation between Carnap and Grice
xldoc.description: An attempt to discover the points of concord and dischord bewteen Carnap and Grice.
xldoc.maintitle:
A Conversation between Carnap and Grice
as it might have been

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: A short comparative treatise on the philosophies of Carnap and Grice probing the principle areas of substantive disagreement and asking whether a reconciliation might eventually have been possible.

subsec.title: A Conversation Between Carnap and Grice (PDF)
